description: Enterprise techniques used by Uroburos, ATT&CK software S0022 v1.0
name: Uroburos (S0022)

techniques.comment: [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) uses a custom packer.(Citation: Symantec Waterbug)
[Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) is a rootkit used by [Turla](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0010).(Citation: Kaspersky Turla)
